function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through smart IEQ sensor nodes","Impact":"Potential spread of diseases among building occupants","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of sensor nodes, and implementation of air filtration systems","Technologies":"UV-C light disinfection, HEPA filters, sensor enclosure with antimicrobial coating","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation due to sensor malfunction or misconfiguration","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality leading to health issues for building occupants","Mitigation":"Regular sensor calibration and maintenance, implementation of ventilation monitoring systems","Technologies":"Calibration tools, airflow sensors, automated ventilation control systems","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Data security risks related to sensor communication","Impact":"Potential exposure of personal data and sensitive information","Mitigation":"Implementation of secure communication protocols, regular cybersecurity audits","Technologies":"SSL/TLS encryption, blockchain technology, intrusion detection systems","People":"Building occupants, IT staff","Owner":"Building management, IT staff"}]}
